INSERT INTO so_return(
parent_order_code,
order_code,
user_id,
merchant_id,
return_status,
refund_status,
actual_return_amount,
apply_return_amount,
return_type,
return_remark,
service_user_id,
service_desc,
service_return_reason,
apply_time,
return_reason,
refund_time,
consignee_address,
consignee_name,
consignee_mobile,
courier_number,
logistics_company,
refund_confirm_user_id,
refund_no,
audit_reason,
audit_user_id,
audit_user_name,
freight,
cancel_status,
audit_time,
type,
order_create_time,
return_reason_id,
return_code,
is_pick_up,
user_courier_number,
user_logistics_company_id,
update_time,
create_time,
platform_id,
) VALUES (
#{parentOrderCode},
#{orderCode},
#{userId},
#{merchantId},
#{returnStatus},
#{refundStatus},
#{actualReturnAmount},
#{applyReturnAmount},
#{returnType},
#{returnRemark},
#{serviceUserId},
#{serviceDesc},

#{type},

#{returnCode},

#{createTime},

)

mapper.update:
UPDATE so_return
parent_order_code = #{parentOrderCode},
order_code = #{orderCode},
user_id = #{userId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
return_status = #{returnStatus},
refund_status = #{refundStatus},
actual_return_amount = #{actualReturnAmount},
apply_return_amount = #{applyReturnAmount},
return_type = #{returnType},
return_remark = #{returnRemark},
service_user_id = #{serviceUserId},
service_desc = #{serviceDesc},
service_return_reason = #{serviceReturnReason},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
return_reason = #{returnReason},
refund_time = #{refundTime},
consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress},
consignee_name = #{consigneeName},
consignee_mobile = #{consigneeMobile},
courier_number = #{courierNumber},
logistics_company = #{logisticsCompany},
refund_confirm_user_id = #{refundConfirmUserId},
refund_no = #{refundNo},
audit_reason = #{auditReason},
audit_user_id = #{auditUserId},
audit_user_name = #{auditUserName},
freight = #{freight},
cancel_status = #{cancelStatus},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
type = #{type},
order_create_time = #{orderCreateTime},
return_reason_id = #{returnReasonId},
return_code = #{returnCode},
is_pick_up = #{isPickUp},
user_courier_number = #{userCourierNumber},
user_logistics_company_id = #{userLogisticsCompanyId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
